title: Temporarily use the Linux output for Tizen on Windows

comments.author: mikekinsman
comments.body:
OPS Build status updates of commit _[aec9ab2](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/818/commits/aec9ab2c7ce1ecb4c24bddb6fcbd6f80ce2943a9)_: 

### :white_check_mark: Validation status: passed


File | Status | Preview URL | Details
---- | ------ | ----------- | -------
[scripts/azure-pipelines.yml](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/dev/skip-tizen-windows/scripts/azure-pipelines.yml) | :white_check_mark:Succeeded | |

For more details, please refer to the [build report](https://opbuildstorageprod.blob.core.windows.net/report/2019%5C3%5C25%5C81ca5486-8c50-0a94-05c4-486e23e99ecf%5CPullRequest%5C201903251801438552-818%5Cworkflow_report.html?sv=2015-02-21&sr=b&sig=0zkaBa41xU5%2BcVSQXA8yfA2yQA%2BPCFjfGNIjLc9aJb8%3D&st=2019-03-25T17%3A59%3A01Z&se=2019-04-25T18%3A04%3A01Z&sp=r).

**Note:** If you changed an existing file name or deleted a file, broken links in other files to the deleted or renamed file are listed only in the full build report.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
After a fair bit of research, I managed to isolate the issue and have reported it to both the Azure and the Tizen teams. Here is some more information on the issue: https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/506430/the-usepythonversion-task-breaks-the-build-for-no.html

Until I manage to determine the actual issue and if there is a fix, I am going to merge this PR as we are already building Tizen on macOS and Linux.
